titles.title: Encouraging Americans to recognize the historical significance of Emancipation Day to the Virgin Islands of the United States and the Nation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the continued celebration of Emancipation Day.
